dct_title_s: Makkah Al Mukararmah - The Holy Capital. (Verso)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and shading. Includes legend of roads, public buildings, and Hajj season services. Inset map of the Holy Mosque Area. Maps on verso: Mecca al-Mukarramah and Holy Places, scale 1:32,000; Jeddah, Makkah al Mukarramah and Taif Road Network, scale 1:1,000,000; Urban Development Boundaries of the Holy City of Makkah to 1415H (1995 AD), scale 1:400,000. Verso includes index of public buildings and roads, telephone numbers of services, and legend. Title on cover panel: Map and Guide of Makkah Al Mukarramah and Holy Places.
dct_publisher_sm: Jiddah, al-Mamlakah al-ʻArabīyah al-Saʻūdīyah : Zakī Muḥammad ̕Alī Fārisī , [l987].
